gpt-message.content: You are an expert in hardware design with a deep understanding of Verilog RTL codes. Now I want to train a large language model for code comment generation tasks specifically focused on Verilog RTL codes. And I want you to help me process the raw data, transforming it into suitable formats that can serve as inputs and outputs for the model.

Name of the module and its functionality is as follows: 
Sorry, but the given Verilog code seems to be corrupted or not in a human-readable format. It's filled with non-alphanumeric and special characters, which don't represent any kind of meaningful Verilog code.

For a comprehensive analysis, the code should be in valid Verilog syntax. Please provide the appropriate Verilog code so that a meaningful analysis can be done.

Input and output ports and their explanation is as follows: 
I regret to inform you that the provided code doesn't seem to be in proper Verilog or any human-readable format. It's filled with special non-alphanumeric characters which signify the content might be corrupt or mistaken.

In order for me to answer your questions about the input/output ports and their role, please provide the script in a valid Verilog format. With that information, I can assist you in understanding the structure and functionality of the Verilog module.

Internal signals and their explanation is as follows: 
I'm afraid your request can't be processed as expected because the code provided is not in a valid or recognizable format. The content contains non-alphanumeric and special characters, and is thus impossible to decipher. Consequently, any internal signals present within the code can't be identified, nor their functions explained.

To assist you effectively, I need you to provide a code snippet in proper Verilog syntax. This will enable us to identify and explain the role of all internal signals used in the module accurately and concisely.

Once the valid Verilog code is supplied, I'll be able to provide the details in the requested format:
Internal signals: [internal signals]. Explanation: [internal signal explanation].
